attributes.additional_details: Gyms need to remain open during lockdown because staying fit and healthy is  beneficial to a lot of people in the community.  Mental health is at an all time low, and physical health can only be a benefit.  It will also save lives for people suffering with depression or anxiety and the need to keep fit and stay focused to get through this. Millions of others will agree with me and we must be heard.
attributes.background: I want the government to keep gyms open as they are essential.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
